targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    "date" AS time,
    sum(cum_cases) AS "Cases",
    sum(cum_death) AS "Deaths",
    sum(new_cases) AS "Cases Today",
    sum(new_death) AS "Deaths Today"
FROM app.covid
WHERE "date" = (SELECT max("date") FROM app.covid
                WHERE $__timeFilter(date)) 
GROUP BY 1;

SELECT
    "date" AS time,
    sum(new_cases) AS cases,
    - sum(new_death) AS death
FROM app.covid
WHERE $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT  m.iso2 AS name, cum_cases
FROM (SELECT country_code,
             cum_cases,
             -- cum_death,
             CASE WHEN cum_cases > 0 THEN (cum_death::FLOAT / cum_cases::FLOAT) ELSE 0 END AS death_rate
      FROM app.covid
      WHERE "date" = (SELECT max("date") FROM app.covid)) n
         LEFT OUTER JOIN app.world m ON n.country_code = m.iso2
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT
  country AS name, 
  CASE WHEN cum_cases > 0 THEN (cum_death::FLOAT  / cum_cases::FLOAT) * 1000 ELSE 0 END AS value
FROM app.covid
WHERE "date" = (SELECT max("date") - '1Day'::INTERVAL
FROM app.covid WHERE $__timeFilter(date));

SELECT
    "date" AS time,
    who_region AS metric,
    sum(new_cases)
FROM app.covid
WHERE $__timeFilter(date)
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT 
  "date" AS time,
    who_region AS metric,
    sum(new_death)
FROM app.covid
WHERE $__timeFilter(date)
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT n.country_code AS name, cum_cases, cum_death, death_rate,
       m.iso3, m.name_en, m.name_local, m.name_cn
FROM (SELECT country_code,
             cum_cases,
             cum_death,
             CASE WHEN cum_cases > 0 THEN (cum_death::FLOAT / cum_cases::FLOAT) ELSE 0 END AS death_rate
      FROM app.covid
      WHERE "date" = (SELECT max("date") FROM app.covid)) n
         LEFT OUTER JOIN app.world m ON n.country_code = m.iso2;

SELECT 
  "date" AS time,
  country_code AS metric,
  cum_cases
FROM app.covid
WHERE "date" = (SELECT max("date") FROM app.covid WHERE $__timeFilter(date));

SELECT 
  "date" AS time,
  country_code AS metric,
  cum_death
FROM app.covid
WHERE "date" = (SELECT max("date") FROM app.covid WHERE $__timeFilter(date));

SELECT 
  "date" AS time,
  country_code AS metric,
  new_death
FROM app.covid
WHERE $__timeFilter(date)
group by 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT date AS time, country_code AS metric,
       round(((CASE WHEN cases_15d > 0 THEN death_15d::FLOAT / cases_15d ELSE 0 END))::NUMERIC,6) AS death_ratio_15d
FROM (SELECT *,
             cum_death - lag(cum_death, 30) over w AS death_15d,
             cum_cases - lag(cum_cases, 30) over w AS cases_15d
      FROM app.covid
      WINDOW w AS (partition by country_code ORDER BY date)
     ) d
ORDER BY 1, 2;
